item.title: semantic code search first stab
item.description: The idea here was to try out Sentence Transformers , https://sbert.net , on source code search. And as a first stab, a corpus was built with, hey why not, the code from the #sentence-transformers repo. The documentation at https://www.sbert.net/examples/applications/semantic-search/README.html#python was used for the basic test here. And a small bit of code at the bottom here, shows how the lines from the python source files were written to a python list first.
